page.title: 07Employment the Hilton Area
page.content: In this area there are three main sources of employment, agriculture, forestry work ad Milton Abbey Schol. In agricultue consierable skills are required as new technology i.e. computer fed herds, modern curculation cleaning plants for dairy equipment. Round silage and hay bales, bigger combine harvesterss mean fewer jobs and employ more able men. The Forestry commission employ a number of men for felling, clearing, and replanting the woodlands. A large domestic and outside staff are kept at Milton Abbey School or the care of the boys, cooks, cleaners, laundry workers inside, relations in these groups are very good strikes are unheard of, people staying for years in the same jobs.
